name: MINIREVENGE DEMO
description:
My Name is iReviv3 I've been creating games for almost a year but still not the as good as I want to be but im still trying I hope you guys enjoy this game.

This game is about a circle and how his family was killed and he wants to get revenge on the people who did it when the full game comes out i will fix and make the game and everything else look better

I would also appreciate donations if any of you can.

Bug  1.If your game freezes just restart the game then it will work

Bug 2.When you resume you freeze so if that happens press escape to resume Do the same thing if your survival freezes just press escape
